<h3 id="X38034">X(38034) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(5)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^3+(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38034) = X(1)+2*X(546) = 5*X(3)-11*X(5550) = 5*X(4)+7*X(3622) = X(4)+2*X(5901) = X(4)+5*X(18493) = 2*X(4)+X(34773) = 5*X(5)-2*X(10) = X(5)+2*X(946) = 7*X(5)+2*X(4301) = 4*X(5)-X(5690) = X(5)-4*X(9955) = 7*X(5)-4*X(9956) = 3*X(5)-2*X(10175) = 11*X(5)-2*X(11362) = 2*X(5)+X(22791) = 19*X(5)-10*X(31399) = 3*X(5)-X(38112) = 7*X(5)-2*X(38127) = 7*X(3622)-10*X(5901) = 7*X(3622)-5*X(10246) = 14*X(3622)-5*X(34773) = 11*X(5550)+5*X(9812) = 2*X(5901)-5*X(18493) = 4*X(5901)-X(34773) = X(10246)-5*X(18493) = 10*X(18493)-X(34773)</b>

<p>
X(38034) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 9812}, {4, 10246}, {165, 12699}, {355, 16200}, {381, 5603}, {946, 3817}, {1699, 5886}, {3656, 5587}, {3830, 5731}, {3845, 10283}, {4301, 38127}, {10273, 12672}, {10739, 15735}, {17502, 22793}, {22791, 38042}, {26446, 31162}<br>
X(38034) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 3817), (165, 140), (549, 11230), (550, 17502), (3817, 9955), (4297, 31662), (5587, 5066), (5690, 38042), (8703, 10165), (10246, 5901), (11231, 10171), (17502, 1125), (17504, 19883), (26446, 547), (34773, 10246), (38028, 5886), (38042, 5), (38112, 10175), (38127, 9956), (38138, 38140)<br>
X(38034) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 5901, 34773), (4, 18493, 5901), (5, 946, 22791), (5, 22791, 5690), (5, 38112, 10175), (496, 12047, 6147), (946, 9955, 5), (946, 22835, 7956), (1125, 22793, 550), (1699, 38021, 5886), (5603, 9779, 381), (5886, 38028, 38022), (7988, 26446, 547), (7988, 31162, 26446), (8227, 12699, 140), (10175, 38112, 38042), (12611, 16174, 1484), (13464, 18480, 1483), (17605, 30384, 495), (19862, 31663, 14869), (38038, 38039, 5603), (38071, 38138, 38140), (38141, 38142, 381)<br>
